name: Miss Snowman
skill: Restores 1687/2147 HP to 2 allies (melee priority). Targets receive 15/19% less DMG for a limited time.

additional_data.description: The spirit of a woman fashioned out of snow. As you might expect, she is rather an expert on the treatment and handling of snow and ice. She was once asked to judge an ice sculpting contest but spent the whole time rushing around telling the contestants how to improve their creations. As a result, the quality of the sculptures was far better than any year previous.
additional_data.how_to_acquire:
◦ Limited Jewel Summon 24/12/16 - 06/01/17
◦ Trade at Exchange for 5 Mochi 06/01/17 - 11/01/17
additional_data.notes_and_trivia:
◦ Summon rate increased until 06/01/17
◦ Can only be exchanged once

skill: "Nobody knows more about fun in the snow than me!"
summon: "I know everything there is to know about snow!"
limit_break: "I'm going to be the best snowperson I can be!"
